data.title: All I Need Is a Miracle. All I Need Is You, God!
data.meta_description: A blog for those that worry and dwell on life's difficulties. Encouragement from God's Word to help repurpose our dwelling on His presence and faithfulness.
data.text:
According to C.S. Lewis, "We read to know that we are not alone." Fellow Mind Dwellers, I am here to tell you that You Are Not Alone. There are others like us that search for the deeper meanings in the stories of our lives.

Join me. Let's dwell together and take notice of how God is speaking to all of us in and through the actions and interactions of each day. Enter your email in the sign up box to receive blog updates. (The sign up box is located at the end of each blog.)
